atk-s0508a29:2_0: Terasanipāte yāhu raṭṭhetiādikā āyasmato soṇassa koḷivisassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a29:2_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacini.
atk-s0508a29:2_3: Ayaṁ kira anomadassissa bhagavato kāle mahāvibhavo seṭṭhi hutvā upāsakehi saddhiṁ vihāraṁ gantvā satthu
atk-s0508a29:2_4: santike dhammaṁ sutvā pasannamānaso satthu caṅkamanaṭṭhāne sudhāya parikammaṁ kāretvā nānāvaṇṇehi pupphehi
atk-s0508a29:2_6: tathā satthu bhikkhusaṅghassa ca dīghasālaṁ kāretvā niyyādesi.
atk-s0508a29:2_7: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṁsavatīnagare seṭṭhikule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a29:2_9: So vayappatto vihāraṁ gantvā satthu santike dhammaṁ suṇanto satthāraṁ ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ āraddhavīriyānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṁ disvā,
atk-s0508a29:2_10: sayampi taṁ ṭhānantaraṁ patthento sattāhaṁ mahādānaṁ pavattetvā paṇidhānamakāsi.
atk-s0508a29:2_11: Satthāpi tassa patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṁ disvā byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a29:3_0: Sopi yāvajīvaṁ kusalaṁ katvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto parinibbute kassapadasabale anuppanne amhākaṁ bhagavati
atk-s0508a29:3_1: bārāṇasiyaṁ kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto gaṅgātīre paṇṇasālaṁ karitvā ekaṁ paccekabuddhaṁ temāsaṁ
atk-s0508a29:3_4: Sopi kulaputto yāvajīvaṁ tattha puññāni katvā tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto amhākaṁ bhagavato
atk-s0508a29:3_5: kāle campānagare usabhaseṭṭhissa gehe paṭisandhiṁ gaṇhi.
atk-s0508a29:3_6: Tassa paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya seṭṭhissa mahābhogakkhandho abhivaḍḍhi.
atk-s0508a29:3_8: tassa pubbe paccekabuddhassa satasahassagghanikarattakambalapariccāgena suvaṇṇavaṇṇo sukhumālataro ca attabhāvo ahosi,
atk-s0508a29:3_12: satavihatakappāsassa viya samphasso pādatalesu maṇikuṇḍalāvaṭṭavaṇṇāni lomāni jāyiṁsu.
atk-s0508a29:3_13: Vayappattassa tassa tiṇṇaṁ utūnaṁ anucchavike tayo pāsāde kāretvā nāṭakāni upaṭṭhāpesuṁ.
atk-s0508a29:3_14: So tattha mahatiṁ sampattiṁ anubhavanto devakumāro viya paṭivasati.
atk-s0508a29:4_0: Atha amhākaṁ satthari sabbaññutaṁ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakke rājagahaṁ upanissāya viharante bimbisāraraññā
atk-s0508a29:4_1: pakkosāpito asītiyā gāmikasahassehi saddhiṁ rājagahaṁ āgato,
atk-s0508a29:4_2: satthu santikaṁ gantvā dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā sāsane pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā,
atk-s0508a29:4_4: na ca sakkā sukheneva sukhaṁ adhigantuṁ,
atk-s0508a29:4_5: kāyaṁ kilametvā samaṇadhammaṁ kātuṁ vaṭṭatī’’ti ṭhānacaṅkamameva adhiṭṭhāya,
atk-s0508a29:4_6: padhānamanuyuñjanto pādatalesu phoṭesu uṭṭhahitesupi vedanaṁ ajjhupekkhitvā daḷhaṁ vīriyaṁ karonto accāraddhavīriyatāya
atk-s0508a29:4_8: ‘‘evaṁ vāyamantopi ahaṁ maggaṁ vā phalaṁ vā nibbattetuṁ na sakkomi,
atk-s0508a29:4_12: Satthā tassa cittācāraṁ ñatvā tattha gantvā vīṇūpamovādena ovaditvā vīriyasamatāyojanavidhiṁ dassento kammaṭṭhānaṁ sodhetvā gijjhakūṭaṁ gato.
atk-s0508a29:4_13: Soṇattheropi satthu sammukhā ovādaṁ labhitvā vīriyasamataṁ yojetvā vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a29:6_0: Sudhāya lepanaṁ katvā, caṅkamaṁ kārayiṁ ahaṁ.
atk-s0508a29:15_0: ‘‘Yo so haṭṭhena cittena, dīghasālaṁ adāsi me;
atk-s0508a29:32_0: Okkāko nāma nāmena, rājā raṭṭhe bhavissati.
atk-s0508a29:36_0: Taruṇī ca piyā kaññā, mahesittaṁ karissati.
atk-s0508a29:38_0: Varaṁ laddhāna sā kaññā, putte pabbājayissati.
atk-s0508a29:42_0: Mā no jāti pabhijjīti, nikhaṇissanti khattiyā.
atk-s0508a29:56_0: Ṭhatvāna yogassa payuttatādino, tatottariṁ pāramatā na vijjati.
atk-s0508a29:58_0: Bhāro me ohito sabbo, nibbutomhi anāsavo.
atk-s0508a29:62_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṁ paccavekkhitvā udānavasena aññābyākaraṇavasena ca –
atk-s0508a29:65_0: Svājja dhammesu ukkaṭṭho, soṇo dukkhassa pāragū.
atk-s0508a29:67_0: ‘‘Pañca chinde pañca jahe, pañca cuttari bhāvaye;
atk-s0508a29:71_0: Sīlaṁ samādhi paññā ca, pāripūriṁ na gacchati.
atk-s0508a29:77_0: Akiccaṁ te na sevanti, kicce sātaccakārino;
atk-s0508a29:84_0: Vīṇopamaṁ karitvā me, dhammaṁ deseti cakkhumā;
atk-s0508a29:85_0: Tassāhaṁ vacanaṁ sutvā, vihāsiṁ sāsane rato.
atk-s0508a29:88_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṁ buddhassa sāsanaṁ.
atk-s0508a29:97_0: Katassa paticayo natthi, karaṇīyaṁ na vijjati.
atk-s0508a29:100_0: Evaṁ rūpā rasā saddā, gandhā phassā ca kevalā.
atk-s0508a29:103_0: Ṭhitaṁ cittaṁ visaññuttaṁ, vayañcassānupassatī’’ti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a29:104_0: Tattha yāhu raṭṭhe samukkaṭṭhoti yo ahu ahosi aṅgaraṭṭhe asītiyā gāmikasahassehi bhogasampattiyā issariyasampattiyā ca sammā ativiya ukkaṭṭho seṭṭho.
atk-s0508a29:104_1: Rañño aṅgassa paddhagūti catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi parisāya rañjanaṭṭhena rañño aṅgādhipatino bimbisārassa
atk-s0508a29:104_2: parivārabhūto gahapativiseso tassa raṭṭhe kuṭumbiko ahūti yojetabbaṁ.
atk-s0508a29:104_3: Svājja dhammesu ukkaṭṭhoti so soṇo ajjetarahi lokuttaradhammesu ukkaṭṭho jāto,
atk-s0508a29:104_4: gihikālepi kehici ukkaṭṭhoyeva hutvā idāni pabbajitakālepi ukkaṭṭhoyeva hotīti attānameva paraṁ viya dasseti.
atk-s0508a29:104_5: Dukkhassa pāragūti sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa pāraṁ pariyantaṁ gato,
atk-s0508a29:104_6: etena dhammesu ukkaṭṭhoti avisesena vuttaṁ ukkaṭṭhabhāvaṁ viseseti arahattādhigamadīpanato.
atk-s0508a29:105_3: apāyakāmasugatisampāpakāni pañcorambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni puriso satthena pāde baddharajjukaṁ viya heṭṭhimena maggattayena chindeyya,
atk-s0508a29:105_4: rūpārūpabhavasampāpakāni pañca uddhambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni puriso gīvāya baddharajjukaṁ viya aggamaggena jaheyya,
atk-s0508a29:105_6: tesaṁ pana uddhambhāgiyasaṁyojanānaṁ pahānāya pañca saddhādīni indriyāni uttari bhāvaye bhāveyya.
atk-s0508a29:105_7: Evaṁbhūto pana bhikkhu rāgasaṅgo dosamohamānadiṭṭhisaṅgoti pañcannaṁ saṅgānaṁ atikkamanena pañcasaṅgātigo hutvā, kāmogho, bhavogho,
atk-s0508a29:105_9: avijjoghoti catunnaṁ oghānaṁ tiṇṇattā oghatiṇṇoti vuccati.
atk-s0508a29:106_4: Māno hi unnamanākāravuttiyā tucchabhāvena naḷo viyāti ‘‘naḷo’’ti vuccati.
atk-s0508a29:106_9: pāripūriṁ na gacchatīti tassa sīlādīnaṁ paṭipakkhasevino lokiyopi tāva sīlādiguṇo pāripūriṁ na gacchati,
atk-s0508a29:107_1: Bhikkhuno hi pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya aparimāṇasīlakkhandhagopanaṁ araññavāso dhutaṅgapariharaṇaṁ bhāvanārāmatāti evamādi kiccaṁ nāma.
atk-s0508a29:107_2: Yehi pana idaṁ yathāvuttaṁ attano kiccaṁ,
atk-s0508a29:107_5: parikkhāramaṇḍanaṁ paccayabāhuliyanti evamādi bhikkhuno akiccaṁ nāma,
atk-s0508a29:107_7: tesaṁ mānanaḷaṁ ukkhipitvā caraṇena unnaḷānaṁ sativossaggena pamattānaṁ cattāropi āsavā vaḍḍhanti.
atk-s0508a29:108_8: Sātaccakārinoti satatakārino tesaṁ satiyā avippavāsena satānaṁ sātthakasampajaññaṁ,
atk-s0508a29:108_12: cattāropi āsavā atthaṁ gacchanti parikkhayaṁ abhāvaṁ gacchantīti attho.
atk-s0508a29:109_0: Idāni attano santike ṭhitabhikkhūnaṁ ovādaṁ dento ‘‘ujumaggamhī’’ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a29:109_1: Tattha ujumaggamhi akkhāteti antadvayaparivajjanena kāyavaṅkādippahānena ca ujuke majjhimapaṭipadābhūte ariyamagge satthārā bhāsite.
atk-s0508a29:109_4: Attanā codayattānanti idha atthakāmo kulaputto apāyabhayapaccavekkhaṇādinā attanāva attānaṁ codento.
atk-s0508a29:110_2: Accāraddhamhi vīriyamhīti vipassanaṁ bhāventena mayā samādhinā vīriyaṁ samarasaṁ akatvā ativiya vīriye paggahite.
atk-s0508a29:110_4: Vīṇopamaṁ karitvā meti āyasmato soṇassa ‘‘ye kho keci bhagavato sāvakā āraddhavīriyā viharanti.
atk-s0508a29:110_6: atha ca pana me nānupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuccati,
atk-s0508a29:110_7: tasmāhaṁ vibbhamissāmī’’ti citte uppanne satthā iddhiyā tassa sammukhe attānaṁ dassetvā ‘‘kasmā tvaṁ, soṇa,
atk-s0508a29:110_9: kusalo tvaṁ pubbe agāriyabhūto vīṇāya tantissare’’ti pucchitvā tena ‘‘evaṁ,
atk-s0508a29:110_11: Yadā te vīṇāya tantiyo accāyatā honti,
atk-s0508a29:110_12: api nu te vīṇā tasmiṁ samaye saravatī vā hoti kammaññā vāti? No hetaṁ,
atk-s0508a29:110_14: yadā te vīṇāya tantiyo atisithilā honti,
atk-s0508a29:110_15: api nu te vīṇā tasmiṁ samaye saravatī vā hoti kammaññā vāti? No hetaṁ, bhante.
atk-s0508a29:110_17: yadā pana te vīṇāya tantiyo neva accāyatā honti,
atk-s0508a29:110_19: api nu te vīṇā tasmiṁ samaye saravatī vā hoti kammaññā vāti? Evaṁ, bhante.
atk-s0508a29:110_25: indriyānañca samataṁ paṭivijjhā’’ti evaṁ vīṇaṁ upamaṁ katvā pavattitena vīṇopamovādena mayhaṁ dhammaṁ desesi.
atk-s0508a29:110_26: Tassāhaṁ vacanaṁ sutvāti tassa bhagavato vacanaṁ vīṇopamovādaṁ sutvā antarā uppannaṁ vibbhamitukāmataṁ pahāya satthu sāsane rato abhirato vihariṁ.
atk-s0508a29:111_0: Viharanto ca samathaṁ paṭipādesiṁ vīriyasamataṁ yojento saddhāpaññānaṁ viya samādhivīriyānaṁ samarasataṁ
atk-s0508a29:111_1: uppādento jhānādhiṭṭhānaṁ vipassanāsamādhiṁ sampādesiṁ vipassanaṁ ussukkāpesiṁ.
atk-s0508a29:112_4: paṭhamaṁ tāva pabbajjābhimukho hutvā kāme pahāya pabbajitvā ca sīlavisodhanaṁ araññavāso dhutaṅgapariharaṇaṁ
atk-s0508a29:112_6: Pavivekañca cetasoti cetaso pavivekañca adhimuttassa evaṁ nekkhammādhimuttassa sato catukkapañcakajjhānānaṁ nibbattanena viveke yuttassa payuttassa.
atk-s0508a29:112_7: Abyābajjhādhimuttassāti abyābajjhe nidukkhatāya adhimuttassa jhānasamāpattiyo nibbattetvā samathasukhe yuttappayuttassa.
atk-s0508a29:112_8: Upādānakkhayassa cāti catunnampi upādānānaṁ khayante arahatte adhimuttassa.
atk-s0508a29:112_10: Taṁ yathādhigataṁ jhānaṁ pādakaṁ katvā arahattādhigamāya vipassanaṁ anuyuñjantassāti attho.
atk-s0508a29:113_0: Taṇhakkhayādhimuttassāti taṇhā khīyati etthāti taṇhakkhayo, nibbānaṁ,
atk-s0508a29:113_3: Asammohañca cetasoti asammohasampajaññavasena cittassa asammohapavattiṁ sammohasamucchindanena vā cittassa asammohabhūtaṁ ariyamaggaṁ adhimuttassa.
atk-s0508a29:113_4: Disvā āyatanuppādanti cakkhādīnaṁ āyatanānaṁ yathāsakapaccayehi khaṇe khaṇe uppādaṁ,
atk-s0508a29:113_5: tappaṭipakkhato nirodhañca vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya disvā dassanahetu sammā cittaṁ vimuccatīti
atk-s0508a29:113_6: sammā hetunā ñāyena maggapaṭipāṭiyā sabbāsavato cittaṁ vimuccati.
atk-s0508a29:114_2: tato eva accantupasamena santacittassa khīṇāsavabhikkhuno katassa kusalassa akusalassa vā upacayo natthi maggeneva samugghātitattā,
atk-s0508a29:114_4: Evaṁ bhūtassa yathā ekaghano selo pabbato pakativātena na samīrati na saṁkampati,
atk-s0508a29:114_5: evaṁ iṭṭhā ca aniṭṭhā ca rūpādayo ārammaṇadhammā tādino tādibhāvappattassa ṭhitaṁ anejaṁ pahīnasabbasokatāya
atk-s0508a29:114_7: Assa ca ārammaṇadhammassa kālena kālaṁ phalasamāpattiṁ samāpajjitvā vipassanto vayaṁ nirodhaṁ khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanasabhāvaṁ anupassatīti aññaṁ byākāsi.
